name: Broken Syntax
description:
Broken Syntax is a low-poly action adventure game where our Hero "Bug" has woken up in a strange place with no memory of who he is. He rescues a fairy from a prison and they set out on their journey to find an evil Baron of the Flatwoods to hopefully answer some questions. But, before they confront him, they must find special weapons to help them along their journey.

Credits

Narrative/Musician/SFX: Isaac Cook

Programmer/Artist: Michael Little

Producer/Animator: Marc Karsai

Level Designer/Texturing/SFX: Matt Ustach
